thread.title: World's only piece of a revolutionary metal goes missing | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: World's only piece of a revolutionary metal goes missing | Daily Mail Online

author: Harry Pettit For Mailonline
title: World's only piece of a revolutionary metal goes missing | Daily Mail Online
text: Only piece of 'revolutionary' metallic hydrogen in the world DISAPPEARS just weeks after it was first created Creation of metallic hydrogen had been heralded as a major breakthrough But the Harvard scientists who created it say it has now gone missing The sample could have been lost inside the machinery that kept it stable Or it could have been destroyed after turning to a gas at room temperature Some claim the material was never created by the researchers in the first place Published: 16:40 GMT, 22 February 2017 | Updated: 16:40 GMT, 22 February 2017 128 shares
